thread.title: Chewy: Renewed Sales Momentum Gives Me Hope (Upgrade)
thread.title_full: Chewy: Renewed Sales Momentum Gives Me Hope (Upgrade)

author: Gary Alexander
title: Chewy: Renewed Sales Momentum Gives Me Hope (Upgrade)
text:
Amid the broad rally that overtook the markets after Donald Trump's re-election to the White House, a number of out-of-favor rebound stocks have also enjoyed meaningful bounce-backs.
Among these is Chewy (NYSE:CHWY), the
